message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Let's split it evenly.  Fair is fair!
You said fair is fair, but I'm willing to take more. Accept or face another round!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to get a good share too. Let's make a deal.
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Make a better offer or accept this one!
I'm sticking with a fair split, Alice.  Time is running out, let's get this done.
Time is running out, Bob. You'd better accept this offer or walk away with nothing!
Alice, we're getting close to the end. I'm still hoping for a more even split, but I'm willing to compromise.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Alice, I'm willing to go down to 300000 to end this, but this is my final offer.  Let's not both lose everything.
It's now or never, Bob. Take nothing or take my final offer!
Alice, we're both going to lose everything if we don't settle.  I'm willing to give you a significant amount, but this is the best I can do.
